ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_recoscl | |- ( A e. RR -> ( cos ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | #P_cosbnd | |- ( A e. RR -> ( -u 1 <_ ( cos ` A ) /\ ( cos ` A ) <_ 1 ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_simpld | |- ( A e. RR -> -u 1 <_ ( cos ` A ) ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_simprd | |- ( A e. RR -> ( cos ` A ) <_ 1 ) |
| 5 |  | #P_neg1rr | |- -u 1 e. RR |
| 6 |  | #P_1re | |- 1 e. RR |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_elicc2i | |- ( ( cos ` A ) e. ( -u 1 [,] 1 ) <-> ( ( cos ` A ) e. RR /\ -u 1 <_ ( cos ` A ) /\ ( cos ` A ) <_ 1 ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 3, 4, 7 | #P_syl3anbrc | |- ( A e. RR -> ( cos ` A ) e. ( -u 1 [,] 1 ) ) |
